description: Indulge in our exquisite biryani, a tantalizing fusion of aromatic basmati rice, succulent meats, and a symphony of spices. An enchanting culinary journey that captures the essence of South Asia's rich flavors, exclusively at our restaurant.

Savor our iconic Butter Chicken, a culinary masterpiece featuring tender tandoori-grilled chicken enveloped in a velvety tomato and cream sauce. A symphony of rich flavors awaits, redefining your dining experience at our restaurant.

Discover Paneer Tikka perfection at our restaurant.Delight in marinated paneer, tandoor- charred to smoky perfection, served with zesty chutney.A vegetarian delight that embodies India's authentic flavors, ready to enchant your palate.

Experience Dal Makhani like never before at our restaurant.Immerse in the creamy, slow- cooked blend of black lentils and spices, creating a harmonious dish that's both comforting and exquisite. A taste of tradition that will leave you craving more.

Elevate your taste journey with Rogan Josh at our restaurant. Relish tender, slow-cooked meat steeped in aromatic spices, crafting a rich and unforgettable masterpiece. An authentic Kashmiri delight that invites you to savor the art of flavor.

Elevate your taste journey with Rogan Josh at our restaurant. Relish tender, slow-cooked meat steeped in aromatic spices, crafting a rich and unforgettable masterpiece. An authentic Kashmiri delight that invites you to savor the art of flavor.

Dive into the flavors of our Fish Curry, a symphony of fresh catch simmered in fragrant spices and coconut milk.A coastal delight that transports you to the shores of culinary excellence, exclusively at our restaurant.

Delight in our Fish Fry, where succulent fish fillets are expertly seasoned and crisped to perfection. A satisfying dish that captures the essence of coastal indulgence, inviting you to savor a crunchy and flavorful experience at our restaurant.

Savor the perfection of Grilled Prawns at our restaurant. Juicy prawns, marinated and char-grilled to succulent perfection, offering a delightful play of smoky flavors. A seafood delicacy that promises an unforgettable culinary journey.
